name: Alone in the Abyss
description:
PLEASE FULLSCREEN GAME FOR PROPER VIEWING - sorry

Stuck in a world with limited access to tiles, survive waves of enemies by protecting yourself with towers. No need to be afraid of the dark.

Controls:

WASD to move, E to interact with tiles and for expansion, and ESC to reach a menu.

Notes:

If you go back to the menu, your progress will reset!

Created By: MrFlambo and Lennychu
